original_text: Whoever touches a dead person, the body of anyone who has died, and does not cleanse himself, defiles the tabernacle of the Lord, and that person shall be cut off from Israel; because the water for impurity was not thrown on him, he shall be unclean. His uncleanness is still on him.
korean_text: 누구든지 죽은 사람의 시체를 만지고 자신을 정결하게 하지 아니하는 자는 여호와의 성막을 더럽힘이라 그가 이스라엘에서 끊어질 것은 정결하게 하는 물을 그에게 뿌리지 아니하므로 깨끗하게 되지 못하고 그 부정함이 그대로 있음이니라

sentences.original_text: the body of anyone who has died
defiles the tabernacle of the Lord
and that person shall be cut off from Israel
because the water for impurity was not thrown on him
sentences.korean_translation: 부정케 하는 물이 그에게 뿌려지지 않았음이라

sentences.original_text: His uncleanness is still on him
